payload.instructions:
# Repository Guidelines

## Project Structure & Module Organization
Frontend code lives in `apps/web/src`. Client routes use React Router under `src/routes`, reusable UI sits in `src/components`, and feature-specific logic is grouped inside `src/features/<feature>`. Shared hooks (`src/hooks`), utilities (`src/lib`), and design tokens (`src/styles`) keep cross-cutting concerns centralized. Static assets belong in `public`. Keep new modules aligned with this layout so imports remain predictable.

## Build, Test, and Development Commands
- `npm run dev`: Launches the Vite dev server with React Fast Refresh.
- `npm run build`: Produces an optimized production bundle via Vite; run before deploys.
- `npm run preview`: Serves the latest build locally for smoke-testing production output.
- `npm run lint`: Executes the project-wide ESLint rules. Treat warnings as errors before opening a PR.

## Coding Style & Naming Conventions
Use modern ES modules with functional React components. Prefer two-space indentation and trailing commas, matching the existing files. Components that render UI should use PascalCase filenames (`ThemeToggle.jsx`), hooks use camelCase prefixed with `use` (`use-mobile.js`), and utility modules go in `src/lib` with hyphenated names. Favor Tailwind classes for styling; co-locate any component-specific CSS in `src/styles` only if a utility class will not suffice. Run `npm run lint` to ensure ESLint (configured in `eslint.config.mjs`) flags accessibility and performance regressions early.

## Testing Guidelines
Automated tests are not yet wired in. When adding them, group specs beside their feature (`src/features/navigation/__tests__/NavMenu.test.jsx`) so intent is obvious. Name files with `.test.jsx` or `.test.js`. For critical flows lacking automation, document manual verification steps in the PR description and exercise them against `npm run start` output. Keep database interactions mocked or pointed at disposable fixtures to avoid mutating shared environments.

## Commit & Pull Request Guidelines
Craft commit subjects in the imperative mood (“Add navigation badges”), roughly 50 characters, with optional detail in the body. Combine related changes rather than batching multiple features. Pull requests should include: a concise summary, linked issue IDs, screenshots or clip recordings for UI changes, and notes on testing performed (`npm run lint`, manual checks, etc.). Request reviews from owners of affected areas (`src/features/<feature>` or shared libs) before merging.

## Environment & Configuration Tips
Local MySQL connectivity is managed via `src/lib/db.js`, which reads `DB_HOST`, `DB_PORT`, `DB_USER`, `DB_PASSWORD`, and `DB_NAME`. Place secrets in `.env.local`; never commit credentials. Tailwind configuration is defined through `components.json` and `postcss.config.mjs`. If you introduce new design tokens, update `src/styles/tokens.css` and keep class names consistent with Tailwind’s utility-first approach. Frontend env vars for Vite must be prefixed with `VITE_`.

content.text:
# AGENTS.md instructions for /home/pjw75/tailwind

<INSTRUCTIONS>
# Repository Guidelines

## Project Structure & Module Organization
Frontend code lives in `apps/web/src`. Client routes use React Router under `src/routes`, reusable UI sits in `src/components`, and feature-specific logic is grouped inside `src/features/<feature>`. Shared hooks (`src/hooks`), utilities (`src/lib`), and design tokens (`src/styles`) keep cross-cutting concerns centralized. Static assets belong in `public`. Keep new modules aligned with this layout so imports remain predictable.

## Build, Test, and Development Commands
- `npm run dev`: Launches the Vite dev server with React Fast Refresh.
- `npm run build`: Produces an optimized production bundle via Vite; run before deploys.
- `npm run preview`: Serves the latest build locally for smoke-testing production output.
- `npm run lint`: Executes the project-wide ESLint rules. Treat warnings as errors before opening a PR.

## Coding Style & Naming Conventions
Use modern ES modules with functional React components. Prefer two-space indentation and trailing commas, matching the existing files. Components that render UI should use PascalCase filenames (`ThemeToggle.jsx`), hooks use camelCase prefixed with `use` (`use-mobile.js`), and utility modules go in `src/lib` with hyphenated names. Favor Tailwind classes for styling; co-locate any component-specific CSS in `src/styles` only if a utility class will not suffice. Run `npm run lint` to ensure ESLint (configured in `eslint.config.mjs`) flags accessibility and performance regressions early.

## Testing Guidelines
Automated tests are not yet wired in. When adding them, group specs beside their feature (`src/features/navigation/__tests__/NavMenu.test.jsx`) so intent is obvious. Name files with `.test.jsx` or `.test.js`. For critical flows lacking automation, document manual verification steps in the PR description and exercise them against `npm run start` output. Keep database interactions mocked or pointed at disposable fixtures to avoid mutating shared environments.

## Commit & Pull Request Guidelines
Craft commit subjects in the imperative mood (“Add navigation badges”), roughly 50 characters, with optional detail in the body. Combine related changes rather than batching multiple features. Pull requests should include: a concise summary, linked issue IDs, screenshots or clip recordings for UI changes, and notes on testing performed (`npm run lint`, manual checks, etc.). Request reviews from owners of affected areas (`src/features/<feature>` or shared libs) before merging.

## Environment & Configuration Tips
Local MySQL connectivity is managed via `src/lib/db.js`, which reads `DB_HOST`, `DB_PORT`, `DB_USER`, `DB_PASSWORD`, and `DB_NAME`. Place secrets in `.env.local`; never commit credentials. Tailwind configuration is defined through `components.json` and `postcss.config.mjs`. If you introduce new design tokens, update `src/styles/tokens.css` and keep class names consistent with Tailwind’s utility-first approach. Frontend env vars for Vite must be prefixed with `VITE_`.

</INSTRUCTIONS>
docker dev.oidc , 운영 env파일들 모두 자세히 확인 한 후 리팩토링해줘.

version: "3.9"

services:
  api:
    build:
      context: ./apps/api
    env_file:
      - ./env/api.common.env
      - ./env/api.prod.env
      - ./env/api.oidc.dev.env
    volumes:
      - ./apps/api:/app
      - api_data:/data
      - api_static:/app/staticfiles
    expose:
      - "8000"
    entrypoint:
      - /bin/sh
      - -c
      - |
          set -e
          python manage.py migrate --noinput
          python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - api

  web:
    build:
      context: ./apps/web
    env_file:
      - ./env/web.prod.env
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: development              # keep dev tooling active
      NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION: "false"     # install dev deps for Vite
      CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING: "true"        # reliable hot reload in Docker
      WATCHPACK_POLLING: "true"
    depends_on:
      - api
    command: sh -c "npm install && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
    volumes:
      - ./apps/web:/app
      - web_node_modules:/app/node_modules
    expose:
      - "3000"
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - web

  nginx:
    image: nginx:1.27-alpine
    depends_on:
      - web
      - api
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./deploy/nginx/default.prod.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
      - api_static:/var/www/static:ro
      - ./deploy/nginx/certs:/etc/nginx/certs:ro
    networks:
      - shared-net

volumes:
  api_data:
  api_static:
  web_node_modules:

networks:
  shared-net:
    external: true
    name: shared-net

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds

  web:

    depends_on:
      - api
    expose:
      - "3000"

      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - web

  nginx:
    image: nginx:1.27-alpine
    depends_on:
      - web

    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./deploy/nginx/default.prod.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
      - api_static:/var/www/static:ro
      - ./deploy/nginx/certs:/etc/nginx/certs:ro
    networks:
      - shared-net

volumes:
  api_data:
  api_static:

networks:

    external: true
    name: shared-net

# ============================================================================== 
# Django 공통 환경 변수 템플릿
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose(dev/prod) 모두에서 가장 먼저 불러오는 기본 설정입니다.
# 운영 비밀 값은 실제 배포 시 외부 Secret Manager 또는 Override 파일로 교체하세요.
# ============================================================================== 

# --- Core metadata ------------------------------------------------------------
# 애플리케이션에서 기본적으로 사용할 타임존
DJANGO_TIME_ZONE=UTC

# --- Database connection ------------------------------------------------------
# Django ORM이 사용할 PostgreSQL 접속 정보 (서비스/배포 환경에 맞게 조정)
DJANGO_DB_ENGINE=django.db.backends.postgresql
DJANGO_DB_NAME=appdb
DJANGO_DB_USER=airflow
DJANGO_DB_PASSWORD=airflow
DJANGO_DB_HOST=airflow-postgres
DJANGO_DB_PORT=5432
# 장기 연결 유지 시간(초). 운영 환경에서는 DB 정책에 맞춰 조정하세요.
DJANGO_DB_CONN_MAX_AGE=60

# --- Authentication redirect targets -----------------------------------------
# 로그인/로그아웃 이후 이동할 기본 경로
DJANGO_LOGIN_REDIRECT_URL=/
DJANGO_LOGOUT_REDIRECT_URL=/

# --- Reverse proxy awareness --------------------------------------------------
# Nginx 같은 프록시 뒤에서 동작할 때 필요한 Django 보안 헤더 플래그
USE_X_FORWARDED_HOST=1
DJANGO_USE_PROXY_SSL_HEADER=1
SECURE_REFERRER_POLICY=same-origin

# --- Public API exposure ------------------------------------------------------
# 외부에서 접근할 때 사용할 API 베이스 경로 (프록시에서 /api 로 라우팅)
PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=

# --- OIDC / ADFS provider defaults -------------------------------------------
# 실제 IdP(Azure AD / 사내 ADFS 등) 정보를 환경별 override 파일에서 설정합니다.
OIDC_CLIENT_ID=
OIDC_ISSUER=
ADFS_AUTH_URL=
ADFS_LOGOUT_URL=
OIDC_REDIRECT_URI=
ADFS_CER_PATH=
ALLOWED_REDIRECT_HOSTS=appleds.net,appleds.net:8003

# --- Gunicorn runtime defaults ------------------------------------------------
# 운영 컨테이너에서 사용되는 기본 워커/스레드 수 (필요 시 override)
GUNICORN_WORKERS=3
GUNICORN_THREADS=2

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds
Output:
# ============================================================================== 
# Django 개발 환경 전용 Override
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose.dev.yml 에서 api.common.env 다음에 로드됩니다.
# - FastAPI 기반 더미 ADFS 서버 연동
# - 코드 변경 사항을 runserver 핫리로드로 즉시 반영
# - HTTP 로컬 리버스 프록시(default.conf) 전제
# ============================================================================== 

# --- Runtime metadata --------------------------------------------------------
ENVIRONMENT=development
DJANGO_SECRET_KEY=local-dev-secret
DJANGO_DEBUG=1
DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS=localhost,127.0.0.1,api

# --- Frontend ↔ Backend URL --------------------------------------------------
# 개발용 Nginx :80 에서 / (프론트엔드) 와 /api (Django)를 동시에 노출
FRONTEND_BASE_URL=http://localhost
DJANGO_CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost
DJANGO_CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS=http://localhost
PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=/api

# --- Security toggles --------------------------------------------------------
# 로컬 개발 시 HTTPS 관련 강제 옵션을 모두 해제합니다.
DJANGO_SECURE=0
SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT=0
SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS=0
SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS=0
SECURE_HSTS_PRELOAD=0

# --- Dummy ADFS (FastAPI) ----------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose.dev 의 adfs 서비스(포트 9000)를 기준으로 설정
OIDC_CLIENT_ID=dummy-client
OIDC_ISSUER=http://localhost:9000/adfs
ADFS_AUTH_URL=http://localhost:9000/authorize
ADFS_LOGOUT_URL=http://localhost:9000/logout
OIDC_REDIRECT_URI=http://localhost/api/auth/google/callback/
ADFS_CER_PATH=/app/dummy_adfs_public.cer
ALLOWED_REDIRECT_HOSTS=appleds.net,appleds.net:8003

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds
Output:
# ==============================================================================
# Django 개발 환경(OIDC 연동) Override
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml 에서 api.common.env 다음 순서로 로드됩니다.
# - 운영과 동일한 사내 OIDC 엔드포인트를 사용하지만, 코드 변경은 runserver로 즉시 반영
# - 더미 ADFS 없이 실제 IdP와 통신하므로 관련 값들을 모두 채워야 합니다.
# ==============================================================================

# --- Runtime metadata --------------------------------------------------------
ENVIRONMENT=development
DJANGO_SECRET_KEY=local-dev-secret
DJANGO_DEBUG=1
DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS=localhost,127.0.0.1,api

# --- Frontend ↔ Backend URL --------------------------------------------------
# nginx 프록시(default.conf)를 통해 / (웹) + /api (Django) 를 함께 노출합니다.
FRONTEND_BASE_URL=http://localhost
DJANGO_CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost
DJANGO_CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS=http://localhost
PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=/api

# --- Security toggles --------------------------------------------------------
# 로컬 개발용: HTTPS 강제 및 HSTS 비활성화
DJANGO_SECURE=0
SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT=0
SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS=0
SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS=0
SECURE_HSTS_PRELOAD=0

# --- Corporate ADFS (OIDC) ---------------------------------------------------
# 운영과 동일한 IdP 정보를 입력하세요. 값이 비어 있으면 OIDC가 비활성화됩니다.
OIDC_CLIENT_ID=
OIDC_ISSUER=
ADFS_AUTH_URL=
ADFS_LOGOUT_URL=
OIDC_REDIRECT_URI=
ADFS_CER_PATH=
ALLOWED_REDIRECT_HOSTS=appleds.net,appleds.net:8003

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds
Output:
# ============================================================================== 
# Django 운영 환경 전용 Override
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose.yml 에서 api.common.env 다음 순서로 로드됩니다.
# - 사내 ADFS(OIDC) 서버 연동을 전제로 실제 엔드포인트 정보를 채웁니다.
# - 코드 변경 시 컨테이너를 재배포하기 전까지 반영되지 않습니다.
# - HTTPS 종단은 deploy/nginx/inner.conf.backup 를 사용하는 내부 Nginx 로 마무리합니다.
# ============================================================================== 

# --- Runtime metadata --------------------------------------------------------
ENVIRONMENT=production
DJANGO_SECRET_KEY=change-me
DJANGO_DEBUG=0
# Nginx 업스트림 호스트(web, api)와 최종 서비스 도메인 전체를 포함
DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS=api,web,example.com

# --- Frontend ↔ Backend URL --------------------------------------------------
# 실제 서비스 도메인으로 교체하세요 (예: https://app.example.com)
FRONTEND_BASE_URL=https://appleds.net
DJANGO_CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=https://appleds.net
DJANGO_CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS=https://appleds.net
PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=/api

# --- Security toggles --------------------------------------------------------
# 운영에서는 HTTPS + HSTS 강제. 프록시 체인에 맞게 값 조정 가능
DJANGO_SECURE=1
SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT=1
SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS=31536000
SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS=1
SECURE_HSTS_PRELOAD=1

# --- Corporate ADFS (OIDC) ---------------------------------------------------
# 사내 ADFS 엔드포인트로 교체하세요. 값이 비어 있으면 외부 IdP 연동이 비활성화됩니다.
OIDC_CLIENT_ID=
OIDC_ISSUER=
ADFS_AUTH_URL=
ADFS_LOGOUT_URL=
OIDC_REDIRECT_URI=
ADFS_CER_PATH=
ALLOWED_REDIRECT_HOSTS=appleds.net,appleds.net:8003

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds
Output:
# ==============================================================================
# Vite 웹 개발 환경 변수
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose.dev.yml 의 web 서비스에서 사용합니다.
# - React Fast Refresh 와 파일 변경 감지 안정화를 위한 개발 설정
# - nginx 프록시(default.conf) 기준으로 API/Airflow 연결
# ==============================================================================

# --- Build/runtime toggles ----------------------------------------------------
NODE_ENV=development
NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false
# Docker for Mac/WSL 환경에서 폴링 방식으로 변경해 파일 변경 감지 안정화
CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING=true
WATCHPACK_POLLING=true

# --- API endpoint wiring -----------------------------------------------------
# Vite 클라이언트에서 사용할 백엔드 API 베이스 URL
VITE_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:8000
# 컨테이너 간 내부 통신용 백엔드 주소
BACKEND_API_URL=http://api:8000

# --- Airflow integration -----------------------------------------------------
# 내부 호출은 Docker 네트워크의 서비스명을 사용, 브라우저는 호스트 포트를 봅니다.
AIRFLOW_BASE_URL=http://airflow-webserver:8080
VITE_AIRFLOW_BASE_URL=http://localhost:8080
AIRFLOW_USERNAME=airflow
AIRFLOW_PASSWORD=airflow

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds
Output:
# ==============================================================================
# Vite 웹 운영 환경 변수
# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
# docker-compose.yml 의 web 서비스에서 사용합니다.
# - 정적 빌드 결과를 제공하며 코드 변경은 재배포 시 반영
# - nginx 프록시(default.conf) 기준으로 API/Airflow 연결
# ==============================================================================

# --- Build/runtime toggles ----------------------------------------------------
NODE_ENV=production

# --- API endpoint wiring -----------------------------------------------------
# 브라우저는 nginx 를 경유하여 /api 로 호출, 컨테이너 내부 요청은 서비스명 사용
VITE_BACKEND_URL=/api
BACKEND_API_URL=http://api:8000

# --- Airflow integration -----------------------------------------------------
# 내부 호출은 Docker 네트워크의 서비스명을 사용하고, 외부 접근 경로는 필요에 따라 교체하세요.
AIRFLOW_BASE_URL=http://airflow-webserver:8080
VITE_AIRFLOW_BASE_URL=/airflow
AIRFLOW_USERNAME=airflow
AIRFLOW_PASSWORD=airflow

Exit code: 0
Wall time: 0 seconds
Output:
services:
  api:
    build:
      context: ./apps/api
    env_file:
      - ./env/api.common.env
      - ./env/api.dev.env
    depends_on:
      - adfs
    volumes:
      - ./apps/api:/app
      - api_data:/data
      - api_static:/app/staticfiles
    ports:
      - "8000:8000"
    entrypoint:
      - /bin/sh
      - -c
      - |
          set -e
          python manage.py migrate --noinput
          python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - api

  web:
    build:
      context: ./apps/web
    env_file:
      - ./env/web.dev.env
    depends_on:
      - api
    command: sh -c "npm install && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
    volumes:
      - ./apps/web:/app
      - web_node_modules:/app/node_modules
    ports:
      - "3000:3000"
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - web

  adfs:
    build:
      context: ./apps/adfs_dummy
    environment:
      DUMMY_ADFS_EMAIL: dummy.user@example.com
      DUMMY_ADFS_NAME: Dummy User
      DUMMY_ADFS_CLIENT_ID: dummy-client
      DUMMY_ADFS_PRIVATE_KEY_PATH: /app/dummy_adfs_private.key
      # 개발 환경에서는 더미 ADFS 서버가 HTTP로 구동되므로 issuer 도 동일하게 맞춘다
      DUMMY_ADFS_ISSUER: http://localhost:9000/adfs
    ports:
      - "9000:9000"
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - adfs

  nginx:
    image: nginx:1.27-alpine
    depends_on:
      - web
      - api
    ports:
      - "80:80"
    volumes:
      - ./deploy/nginx/default.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
      - api_static:/var/www/static:ro
    networks:
      - shared-net

volumes:
  api_data:
  api_static:
  web_node_modules:

networks:
  shared-net:
    external: true
    name: shared-net

payload.text:
**Analyzing environment file inconsistencies**

I’m looking into how the dev.oidc setup mixes production and development environment files, which seems problematic—especially since production env includes sensitive flags like DJANGO_SECURE=1. I want to untangle this by proposing a clearer separation, probably starting dev.oidc from a dev base environment rather than production, and check related docker-compose configs to understand overrides and potential mismatches with nginx configs. This seems like a multi-step refactor worth planning carefully.

summary.text:
**Analyzing environment file inconsistencies**

I’m looking into how the dev.oidc setup mixes production and development environment files, which seems problematic—especially since production env includes sensitive flags like DJANGO_SECURE=1. I want to untangle this by proposing a clearer separation, probably starting dev.oidc from a dev base environment rather than production, and check related docker-compose configs to understand overrides and potential mismatches with nginx configs. This seems like a multi-step refactor worth planning carefully.

payload.text:
**Reviewing and planning env refactor**

I’m analyzing the development OIDC and production env files to propose a clearer, less duplicated structure. The goal is to separate dev and prod settings properly, create new OIDC-specific dev env files for API and web, update docker-compose to use dev bases instead of prod for dev.oidc, and simplify overrides while preserving necessary settings for secure OIDC operation. I’m laying out a detailed step plan to adjust layering, clean env contents, and verify consistency before making any changes.

payload.text:
**Refactoring OIDC and Web Env Files**

I'm reorganizing the environment files to reduce duplication by keeping only OIDC-specific overrides in `api.oidc.dev.env` and creating a new `web.oidc.dev.env` that layers cleanly over `web.dev.env`. I'll also plan to remove redundant environment variables from the docker-compose service blocks where env files now cover those settings, aiming for clearer layering and easier maintenance.

summary.text:
**Refactoring OIDC and Web Env Files**

I'm reorganizing the environment files to reduce duplication by keeping only OIDC-specific overrides in `api.oidc.dev.env` and creating a new `web.oidc.dev.env` that layers cleanly over `web.dev.env`. I'll also plan to remove redundant environment variables from the docker-compose service blocks where env files now cover those settings, aiming for clearer layering and easier maintenance.

payload.name: apply_patch
payload.input:
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: env/api.oidc.dev.env
@@
 # ==============================================================================
 # Django 개발 환경(OIDC 연동) Override
 # ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
-# docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml 에서 api.common.env 다음 순서로 로드됩니다.
-# - 운영과 동일한 사내 OIDC 엔드포인트를 사용하지만, 코드 변경은 runserver로 즉시 반영
-# - 더미 ADFS 없이 실제 IdP와 통신하므로 관련 값들을 모두 채워야 합니다.
+# docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml 에서 api.common.env → api.dev.env 이후에 로드됩니다.
+# - FastAPI 더미 ADFS 설정을 덮어쓰고 실제 IdP 엔드포인트만 입력합니다.
+# - 기본 개발용 디버그/보안 값은 api.dev.env 그대로 사용합니다.
 # ==============================================================================
 
-# --- Runtime metadata --------------------------------------------------------
-ENVIRONMENT=development
-DJANGO_SECRET_KEY=local-dev-secret
-DJANGO_DEBUG=1
-DJANGO_ALLOWED_HOSTS=localhost,127.0.0.1,api
-
-# --- Frontend ↔ Backend URL --------------------------------------------------
-# nginx 프록시(default.conf)를 통해 / (웹) + /api (Django) 를 함께 노출합니다.
-FRONTEND_BASE_URL=http://localhost
-DJANGO_CORS_ALLOWED_ORIGINS=http://localhost
-DJANGO_CSRF_TRUSTED_ORIGINS=http://localhost
-PUBLIC_API_BASE_URL=/api
-
-# --- Security toggles --------------------------------------------------------
-# 로컬 개발용: HTTPS 강제 및 HSTS 비활성화
-DJANGO_SECURE=0
-SECURE_SSL_REDIRECT=0
-SECURE_HSTS_SECONDS=0
-SECURE_HSTS_INCLUDE_SUBDOMAINS=0
-SECURE_HSTS_PRELOAD=0
-
 # --- Corporate ADFS (OIDC) ---------------------------------------------------
 # 운영과 동일한 IdP 정보를 입력하세요. 값이 비어 있으면 OIDC가 비활성화됩니다.
 OIDC_CLIENT_ID=
 OIDC_ISSUER=
*** End Patch

payload.output: {"output":"Success. Updated the following files:\nM env/api.oidc.dev.env\n","metadata":{"exit_code":0,"duration_seconds":0.0}}

payload.text: **Adding new env file for OIDC development**

summary.text: **Adding new env file for OIDC development**

payload.name: apply_patch
payload.input:
*** Begin Patch
*** Add File: env/web.oidc.dev.env
+# ==============================================================================
+# Vite 웹 개발(OIDC) 환경 변수
+# ------------------------------------------------------------------------------
+# docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml 의 web 서비스에서 web.dev.env 다음에 로드됩니다.
+# - 실제 IdP와 연동할 때 nginx 프록시(TLS 종단)를 경유하도록 API/Airflow 엔드포인트를 교체합니다.
+# - 기본 개발용 Fast Refresh/폴링 설정은 web.dev.env 값을 그대로 사용합니다.
+# ==============================================================================
+
+# --- API endpoint wiring -----------------------------------------------------
+# 브라우저는 nginx 를 통해 /api 로 호출하고, 컨테이너 내부 요청은 서비스명을 사용합니다.
+VITE_BACKEND_URL=/api
+BACKEND_API_URL=http://api:8000
+
+# --- Airflow integration -----------------------------------------------------
+# 필요 시 Airflow UI 를 동일 프록시 경로에서 접근하도록 조정합니다.
+VITE_AIRFLOW_BASE_URL=/airflow
+AIRFLOW_BASE_URL=http://airflow-webserver:8080
*** End Patch

payload.output: {"output":"Success. Updated the following files:\nA env/web.oidc.dev.env\n","metadata":{"exit_code":0,"duration_seconds":0.0}}

payload.name: apply_patch
payload.input:
*** Begin Patch
*** Update File: docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml
@@
     build:
       context: ./apps/web
     env_file:
       - ./env/web.dev.env
       - ./env/web.oidc.dev.env
-    environment:
-      NODE_ENV: development              # keep dev tooling active
-      NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION: "false"     # install dev deps for Vite
-      CHOKIDAR_USEPOLLING: "true"        # reliable hot reload in Docker
-      WATCHPACK_POLLING: "true"
     depends_on:
       - api
*** End Patch

version: "3.9"

services:
  api:
    build:
      context: ./apps/api
    env_file:
      - ./env/api.common.env
      - ./env/api.dev.env
      - ./env/api.oidc.dev.env
    volumes:
      - ./apps/api:/app
      - api_data:/data
      - api_static:/app/staticfiles
    expose:
      - "8000"
    entrypoint:
      - /bin/sh
      - -c
      - |
          set -e
          python manage.py migrate --noinput
          python manage.py runserver 0.0.0.0:8000
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - api

  web:
    build:
      context: ./apps/web
    env_file:
      - ./env/web.dev.env
      - ./env/web.oidc.dev.env
    depends_on:
      - api
    command: sh -c "npm install && npm run dev -- --host 0.0.0.0 --port 3000"
    volumes:
      - ./apps/web:/app
      - web_node_modules:/app/node_modules
    expose:
      - "3000"
    networks:
      shared-net:
        aliases:
          - web

  nginx:
    image: nginx:1.27-alpine
    depends_on:
      - web
      - api
    ports:
      - "80:80"
      - "443:443"
    volumes:
      - ./deploy/nginx/default.prod.conf:/etc/nginx/conf.d/default.conf:ro
      - api_static:/var/www/static:ro
      - ./deploy/nginx/certs:/etc/nginx/certs:ro
    networks:
      - shared-net

volumes:
  api_data:
  api_static:
  web_node_modules:

networks:
  shared-net:
    external: true
    name: shared-net

payload.text:
**Summarizing final changes and instructions**

I'll wrap up with a concise message explaining the dev OIDC compose now uses the dev environment layering, referencing the new `env/web.oidc.dev.env` file and the simplified `api.oidc.dev.env`. I'll note the removed redundant environment block and suggest verifying with `docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml config` or running it. I'll also mention existing unrelated local changes remain untouched to avoid confusion.

payload.message:
docker-compose dev OIDC now pulls dev-focused env layers and dedicated overrides, removing the production dependency. Key updates:
- `docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml`: env order is `api.common` → `api.dev` → `api.oidc.dev` and `web.dev` → `web.oidc.dev`; dropped redundant inline env block for the web service.
- `env/api.oidc.dev.env`: trimmed to just the IdP overrides, relying on `api.dev.env` for the usual dev/debug/safety defaults.
- `env/web.oidc.dev.env`: new OIDC-specific web overrides to keep API/Airflow calls on the nginx/TLS path while inheriting the rest from `web.dev.env`.

Next steps:
1) Fill in the real OIDC endpoints in `env/api.oidc.dev.env` (and tweak `env/web.oidc.dev.env` if the proxy path differs).  
2) Sanity check the stack with `docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml config` and a short run to confirm callbacks and cookies work end-to-end.

summary.text:
**Summarizing final changes and instructions**

I'll wrap up with a concise message explaining the dev OIDC compose now uses the dev environment layering, referencing the new `env/web.oidc.dev.env` file and the simplified `api.oidc.dev.env`. I'll note the removed redundant environment block and suggest verifying with `docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml config` or running it. I'll also mention existing unrelated local changes remain untouched to avoid confusion.

content.text:
docker-compose dev OIDC now pulls dev-focused env layers and dedicated overrides, removing the production dependency. Key updates:
- `docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml`: env order is `api.common` → `api.dev` → `api.oidc.dev` and `web.dev` → `web.oidc.dev`; dropped redundant inline env block for the web service.
- `env/api.oidc.dev.env`: trimmed to just the IdP overrides, relying on `api.dev.env` for the usual dev/debug/safety defaults.
- `env/web.oidc.dev.env`: new OIDC-specific web overrides to keep API/Airflow calls on the nginx/TLS path while inheriting the rest from `web.dev.env`.

Next steps:
1) Fill in the real OIDC endpoints in `env/api.oidc.dev.env` (and tweak `env/web.oidc.dev.env` if the proxy path differs).  
2) Sanity check the stack with `docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml config` and a short run to confirm callbacks and cookies work end-to-end.
이 앱을 폐쇄망에 가져가서 dev.oidc환경에서 개발, docker-compose.yml 환경에서 운영을 바로하려고한다 어떤것을 추가 개선 해야할까

payload.message: 이 앱을 폐쇄망에 가져가서 dev.oidc환경에서 개발, docker-compose.yml 환경에서 운영을 바로하려고한다 어떤것을 추가 개선 해야할까

payload.text:
**Listing deployment and offline setup considerations**

I'll provide concise bullet points covering offline mode, registry use, shared external networks, environment variables, nginx certificates, volume persistence, migrations, secrets handling, identity provider connectivity, CA bundles, options to disable Node.js install for dev environments, base URL and CORS flexibility, pinned image versions, Docker networking, handling npm in air-gapped contexts including local mirrors, TLS certs for closed networks, disabling file watchers if needed, and offline pip dependencies with Dockerfile adjustments—all framed as a numeric list for clarity.

payload.message:
다시 폐쇄망으로 옮길 때 막힐 지점과 개선 포인트를 정리했습니다. 우선순위 순서입니다.

- **이미지/패키지 소스**: `api`/`web` 빌드는 PyPI와 npm을 즉시 때립니다. 사내 레지스트리+프록시(또는 캐시된 wheelhouse/node_modules tarball)로 Dockerfile을 조정해 두세요. npm은 `.npmrc`(registry, offline-mirror), pip는 `PIP_INDEX_URL`/미러를 환경변수나 `pip.conf`로 고정. 베이스 이미지도 내부 레지스트리 태그로 교체 필요.
- **external 네트워크 의존**: compose 파일이 `shared-net` external 네트워크를 전제로 합니다. 폐쇄망 클러스터에 동일 이름 네트워크를 사전 생성하거나 internal 네트워크로 전환하도록 옵션화하세요.
- **비밀/환경변수 채우기**: `env/api.oidc.dev.env`와 `env/api.prod.env`의 OIDC 값, `DJANGO_SECRET_KEY`, 허용 호스트/도메인, TLS 경로를 실제 도메인으로 채워야 합니다. 프런트 `VITE_BACKEND_URL`/`VITE_AIRFLOW_BASE_URL`도 프록시 경로가 바뀌면 맞추세요.
- **TLS/CA 준비**: `deploy/nginx/default.prod.conf`는 `/etc/nginx/certs`를 요구합니다. 사내 CA 인증서로 `fullchain.crt`/`server.key`를 준비하고, API 컨테이너 내에서 IdP TLS 검증이 필요하면 CA 번들을 컨테이너에 추가하도록 Dockerfile이나 entrypoint에 처리하세요.
- **운영 볼륨 유지**: `api_data`/`api_static` 볼륨이 external 설정이 아니라 새로 생성됩니다. 데이터 유지가 필요하면 external 볼륨으로 승격하거나 백업/복구 경로를 준비하세요.
- **헬스/시작 순서**: OIDC 콜백이 느릴 때 대비해 `api`/`web`에 `healthcheck` 추가 후 nginx가 healthy 서비스만 라우팅하도록 하면 운영 전환 안정성이 올라갑니다.
- **엔드포인트 접근성 확인**: dev.oidc 환경은 실제 IdP 통신을 전제로 합니다. 폐쇄망 안에서 IdP/DNS가 열려 있어야 하고, 프록시/방화벽 예외가 필요한지 선확인하세요. 접근 불가 시 더미 ADFS나 내부 모킹 플로우를 남겨두는 것이 좋습니다.
- **밀폐망 배포 절차**: `docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml config`로 병합 확인 후, 이미지 풀/빌드 없이 바로 올릴 수 있게 미리 빌드된 이미지 tar(export)와 env 템플릿을 묶어 전달하는 방식을 준비하세요.

필요하면 Dockerfile/compose에 내부 레지스트리, 미러, external 네트워크 옵션을 바로 반영해 드릴 수 있습니다. 어떤 쪽을 먼저 손볼까요?

summary.text:
**Listing deployment and offline setup considerations**

I'll provide concise bullet points covering offline mode, registry use, shared external networks, environment variables, nginx certificates, volume persistence, migrations, secrets handling, identity provider connectivity, CA bundles, options to disable Node.js install for dev environments, base URL and CORS flexibility, pinned image versions, Docker networking, handling npm in air-gapped contexts including local mirrors, TLS certs for closed networks, disabling file watchers if needed, and offline pip dependencies with Dockerfile adjustments—all framed as a numeric list for clarity.

content.text:
다시 폐쇄망으로 옮길 때 막힐 지점과 개선 포인트를 정리했습니다. 우선순위 순서입니다.

- **이미지/패키지 소스**: `api`/`web` 빌드는 PyPI와 npm을 즉시 때립니다. 사내 레지스트리+프록시(또는 캐시된 wheelhouse/node_modules tarball)로 Dockerfile을 조정해 두세요. npm은 `.npmrc`(registry, offline-mirror), pip는 `PIP_INDEX_URL`/미러를 환경변수나 `pip.conf`로 고정. 베이스 이미지도 내부 레지스트리 태그로 교체 필요.
- **external 네트워크 의존**: compose 파일이 `shared-net` external 네트워크를 전제로 합니다. 폐쇄망 클러스터에 동일 이름 네트워크를 사전 생성하거나 internal 네트워크로 전환하도록 옵션화하세요.
- **비밀/환경변수 채우기**: `env/api.oidc.dev.env`와 `env/api.prod.env`의 OIDC 값, `DJANGO_SECRET_KEY`, 허용 호스트/도메인, TLS 경로를 실제 도메인으로 채워야 합니다. 프런트 `VITE_BACKEND_URL`/`VITE_AIRFLOW_BASE_URL`도 프록시 경로가 바뀌면 맞추세요.
- **TLS/CA 준비**: `deploy/nginx/default.prod.conf`는 `/etc/nginx/certs`를 요구합니다. 사내 CA 인증서로 `fullchain.crt`/`server.key`를 준비하고, API 컨테이너 내에서 IdP TLS 검증이 필요하면 CA 번들을 컨테이너에 추가하도록 Dockerfile이나 entrypoint에 처리하세요.
- **운영 볼륨 유지**: `api_data`/`api_static` 볼륨이 external 설정이 아니라 새로 생성됩니다. 데이터 유지가 필요하면 external 볼륨으로 승격하거나 백업/복구 경로를 준비하세요.
- **헬스/시작 순서**: OIDC 콜백이 느릴 때 대비해 `api`/`web`에 `healthcheck` 추가 후 nginx가 healthy 서비스만 라우팅하도록 하면 운영 전환 안정성이 올라갑니다.
- **엔드포인트 접근성 확인**: dev.oidc 환경은 실제 IdP 통신을 전제로 합니다. 폐쇄망 안에서 IdP/DNS가 열려 있어야 하고, 프록시/방화벽 예외가 필요한지 선확인하세요. 접근 불가 시 더미 ADFS나 내부 모킹 플로우를 남겨두는 것이 좋습니다.
- **밀폐망 배포 절차**: `docker compose -f docker-compose.dev.oidc.yml config`로 병합 확인 후, 이미지 풀/빌드 없이 바로 올릴 수 있게 미리 빌드된 이미지 tar(export)와 env 템플릿을 묶어 전달하는 방식을 준비하세요.

필요하면 Dockerfile/compose에 내부 레지스트리, 미러, external 네트워크 옵션을 바로 반영해 드릴 수 있습니다. 어떤 쪽을 먼저 손볼까요?
